title: Cellular Firmware Verification and Release Manager
summary: The people here at Apple don’t just build products— they craft the kind of wonder that has revolutionized entire industries. It’s the diversity of those people and their ideas that inspires the innovation that runs through everything we do, from amazing technology to industry-leading environmental efforts.
description: As Manager for Cellular Firmware Verification, you will be responsible for leading a team that is accountable for firmware verification, ensuring FW release quality for 4G/5G cellular firmware. You will be in a critical function that requires continuous alignment with cross functional teams and determine the verification scope, incremental test strategy and release cadence.
key_qualifications: Minimum 15 years of 4G/5G cellular industry experience (Master's preferred). 5+ years of direct people management experience, in particular building strong cellular verification teams. Demonstrated leadership in commercialization of multiple generation of cellular modems with responsibility in FW functional area. Deep understanding of Cellular FW verification process, dependencies to system level testing, IODT, IOT and FT campaigns. Leadership in ramping pre-silicon platforms and preparing for comprehensive modem silicon bring-up. Understanding of 3GPP standard, various conformance and operator requirement. Proven track record of large scale FW/SW delivery for complex projects. Hands-on experience in planning detailed project execution, establishing project milestones, resource planning etc. Proficiency in overall FW verification, continuous integration/delivery systems. Experience with automation of test on virtual platforms and hardware devices.
